extends java.lang.Object
    Created by apease on 10/6/15. adapted from http://blog.smellthedata.com/2009/06/python-logistic-regression-with-l2.html

      • lik_minibatch

        public double lik_minibatch(double[] bs)
        Likelihood of the data under the current settings of parameters. Data is smoothed with the alpha parameter, data points are sampled with the minibatch method

      • lik

        public double lik(double[] bs)
        Likelihood of the data under the current settings of parameters. Data is smoothed with the alpha parameter

      • dB_k_minibatch

        public double dB_k_minibatch(int k)
        Define the derivative of the likelihood with respect to beta_k. Need to multiply by -1 because we will be minimizing.

      • dB_k

        public double dB_k(int k)
        Define the derivative of the likelihood with respect to beta_k. Need to multiply by -1 because we will be minimizing.

        public java.lang.String classify(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Parameters:
        values - a list of string values that will be assumed to be floats of features and a final element for the class
        Returns:
        a String representation of the class which is either 1 or 0

      • classifyContinuous

        public double classifyContinuous(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Parameters:
        values - a list of string values that will be assumed to be floats of features and a final element for the class
        Returns:
        a double representation of the likelihood of the class

      • gradientCheck

        public static void gradientCheck()
        Check whether the derivative function for the likelihood dB() is the same as a very small change in the likelihood. This is a cross-check for whether the derivative function is correct.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
